List available resources. This will be in the backend to create the different datasets.

```{r}
#| eval: false
#| echo: false
resources <- readSDMX(providerId = "ISTAT", resource = "dataflow") %>% 
  as_tibble()
```

```{r}
#| eval: false
#| echo: false
id <- resources %>% 
  filter(Name.en %>% str_detect("size")) %>% 
  select(id, Name.it) %>%
  pull(id)
```


## eurostat

```{r}
# Get Eurostat data listing
toc <- get_eurostat_toc()
```

```{r}
toc %>% 
  filter(title %>% str_detect("Enterprises")) %>%
  filter(title %>% str_detect("economic")) %>%
  select(title, code) %>% 
  View()
```
